column4: Koukouváounes)) is a suburb in the northern part of the Athens agglomeration
column6: and a municipality of the Attica region.

column1: Metamorfosi is situated east of the small river Kifisos
column2: 9 km north of Athens city centre. The municipality has an area of 5.502 km2. The built-up area of Metamorfosi is continuous with those of the neighbouring suburbs Lykovrysi
column3: Irakleio and Nea Filadelfeia. Motorway 1 and Motorway 6 intersect in Metamorfosi. The town is served by a Proastiakos suburban railway station.
